pr_title: fix(iot-dev): Fix issue where errors encountered at http message level were handled twice

timeline.message:
fix(iot-dev): Fix issue where errors encountered at http message level were handled twice

This same logic took place at the IotHubTransport layer based on the result of this method call, so no need to include this logic in the HTTP layer

timeline.bodyText: Can you point to where it is handled?
timeline.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: Never mind. Should have read description earlier :)
replies.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: Sure, I can add a note that non-200 codes have their exceptions handled in the transport layer
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: so is it throwing exception at both layers currently?
timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: Currently, the transport layer basically gets notified that the sent message failed twice. The first handling of the failed message works as expected, but the second handling fails because the message is already removed from the expected list and has already had its callback executed.
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
